description:
Learn how to build your very own mortgage free, environmentally sustainable home.

In Part 2 of How to Build a Tiny House, I cover:

Drying-in Your House. In these lectures you’ll learn how to install housewrap and tar paper to protect your house from the weather.

Installing Windows and Doors. In these lectures you’ll learn how to properly install the windows and windows and doors so that they not only function correctly, but also do not leak.

Installing the Siding. In these lectures I show how I am able to side an entire house all by myself. You’ll also learn where to install flashing to further eliminate leaks.

Installing a Metal Roof. In these lectures you’ll learn the best ways to cut the metal for the roof, as well as the order in which the components should be installed.
title: How to Build a Tiny House - Part 2
